page.title: 08Riding of the Marches
page.content: 1985{Riding Of The Marches}is about the most enjoyable event held in Annan this year. Each year a{Queen Of The {Border}is picked. This year her name is Derry Little. More people are picked to be her attendants. I am one of them. There are also page boys, heralds, trumpeters and of course the Champion Robert Barnett and the lady in-waiting is Ashley McKenna. Debbie Clark has won the title of{Miss Annan {1985. Another three people are also picked to be the{Cornet, Cornets Lass and{Standard Bearer.}Other contests held during the A.R.O.M fortnight like the Bonny baby contest, Boat races, and many more to attract big crowds of spectators. Our school won the Inter-School Quiz and the Primary Hand-writing competitions.
